programme.title: Khanka (Ep22)
programme.desc: Crime, Drama, Thriller 2016 A teacher has been sexually harassed by one of her students. She decides to sue him. but as the student is the son of a state official standing against him in court, she finds herself accused of mental disorder. Ghada Abdel Razek, Maged El Masry, Fathy Abd Alwahab, Carolin Khalil, Ahmed Abd El Wareth, Mohamed Gom`aa, Mahmoud Desouqy

programme.title: Tambourines (Ep23)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2021 Complex confrontations and interrelated relationships between members of a folk art group for women and another for men. Mounir Al Zaaby, Hamad Al Roomi, Huda Hussien, Ebrahim Alhasawi, Khaled Albriky, Shima`a Aly, Rawan Mahdi

programme.title: Taj (Ep17)
programme.desc: Action, Romance, Drama, History, Thriller 2024 In the midst of Syria's French mandate, boxer Taj fights not just in the ring, but against accusations of treason from within the resistance, leading him on a gripping journey to prove his loyalty and innocence. Taym Hassan, Bassam Kousa, Dogana Isa, Farah Al Dabiyat, Noura Rahhal, Samer Al Barqawi, Omar Abu Saada, Taim Hasan, Bassam Kouss, Dogana Essa, Farah Al Dbayyat, Nora Rahal, Faia Younan, Nora Rahhal

programme.title: Exit 7 (Ep3)
programme.desc: Comedy, People, Drama 2020 Various sketches depicting the social issues that face the Saudi people approached from a humorous perspective. Nasser Al-Qasabi, Remas Mansour, Abdel Majeed Al Rohedy, Rashed Al Shamrani, Habeeb Al Habeeb, Elham Ali, Aseel Omran, Aws El Sharqy, Khalaf Al Harbi

programme.title: Katha Ankahee (Ep87)
programme.desc: Drama, Family, Thriller, Bollywood 2022 While seeking money for her child's healthcare needs, Katha is in trouble after Viaan's offer to help her. Aditi Sharma, Adnan Khan, Azinkya Mishra, Samar Vermani, Jasveenn Kaur, Ravi Bhushan

programme.title: Ayyoub (Ep11)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2018 In a bid to improve his life, a modest young man strives to handle multiple jobs, but his friends and relatives throw him in prison. He loses his mother after that, which leads him to take revenge. Mostafa Shabaan, Ayten Amer, Mohamed Lotfy, Hannah El Zahed, Mirhan Hussein, Ahmad Saleh, Mohamed Sayyed Basheer

programme.title: The Queen (Ep32)
programme.desc: Drama 2023 Fame, fortune, and love, Ates, one of the country's most iconic basketball players, and his wife Deniz had it all, until a devastating scandal shattered their perfect world. Cevdet Mercan, Serhan Sahin, Ava DuVernay, Burcu zberk, Gokhan Alkan, Selin Sekerci

programme.title: The Agent Of Love (Ep22)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama, Thriller 2023 Circumstances bring together the young and hardworking intelligence agent Onur and Ege, a professional thief, and a love story develops between them. Sukru Ozyildiz, Turul Tlek, Burcu zberk, Asli Smen, Sehsuvar Aktas, Aytac Cicek, Cenk Bogatur

programme.title: Golden Boy (Ep35)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2022 Fareed is a reckless young man who prompts his grandfather to force him to marry, thinking he will learn to take responsibility. His family chooses Seyran, whose life will change completely. Afra Saraoglu, Mert Ramazan Demir, Glin Santircioglu, Emre Altug, Beril Pozam, Burcu Alptekin, Gulseren Budayicioglu

programme.title: The Game: Playing With Seniors (Ep9)
programme.desc: Comedy, Drama 2022 It seems almost impossible for Mazu and Wassim to stop challenging each other despite the difficulties they encountered in the previous game rounds. Hesham Majed, Shiko, Mai Kassab, Mirna Gamil, Mohammad Tharwat, Ahmed Fathy, Moataz Al Tony, Ahmed Saad Wali

programme.title: The Game: Playing With Seniors (Ep10)
programme.desc: Comedy, Drama 2022 It seems almost impossible for Mazu and Wassim to stop challenging each other despite the difficulties they encountered in the previous game rounds. Hesham Majed, Shiko, Mai Kassab, Mirna Gamil, Mohammad Tharwat, Ahmed Fathy, Moataz Al Tony, Ahmed Saad Wali

programme.title: Apple Of Your Eyes (Ep12)
programme.desc: Comedy, People, Drama 2023 Kaltham's innocence appears after 25 years in jail, and she gets released from prison, but she is shocked to be rejected by her daughters and society overall. Hayat Al Fahad, Soaad Ali, Shimaa Aly, Buthaina Al Raisi, Reem Abdullah, Abdulaziz Al Nassaar, Seod Bo Ebid, Ali Shams

programme.title: Genius (Ep136)
programme.desc: People, Drama, Family 2024 Mathematics prodigy Devran comes face-to-face with the father who abandoned them years ago, just as he prepares to leave the country. Old wounds resurface, reigniting his thirst for revenge and escalating the battle between good and evil. Umut Aral, Damla Serim, Aras Bulut Iynemli, Ugur Polat, Taner lmez, Onur Saylak, Melis Sezen, Taner Olmez

programme.title: What If You Love Too Much (Ep35)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2023 Ates is forced return to his hometown of Istanbul and carry out the will of his recently deceased father, while Leyla is a manipulative girl whose goal is to find her family. The two's paths cross in an unfathomable way that neither can fully understand. Kerem Bursin, Hafsanur Sancaktutan, Hatice Aslan, Serif Erol, Nazmi Kirik, Ali Bilgin, Ahmet Ruhan Arca

programme.title: A Pencil (Ep11)
programme.desc: People, Drama, Thriller 2024 A Kuwaiti family suffers a tragedy during the Kuwaiti war as they lose their daughter while attempting to evacuate the country. programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Snow Yellow: When Snow Yellow is deemed the "Squarest of them all", the evil Queen Karen seeks to claim the title for herself by any means necessary. (S14, ep 11)

programme.title: Victorious

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Green Fingers: After Schwoz creates a disease that accidentally effects Charlotte, Henry, his family, and even Ray, he quarantines them in Henry's house in order to find a cure. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: All the President's Thunder-Men: After their requests drive Kickbutt to quit, Max and Phoebe get what they want when Hank is made SuperPresident. But being the First Family takes its toll. (S4, ep 32)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Worst Couple: Jade and Beck help Sinjin with his new game show, but it puts their relationship to the test. Meanwhile, Tori breaks her precious Pear Phone. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Andre's Horrible Girl: Tori notices changes in her friend Andre, whose girlfriend is overbearing and controlling. Jade and Cat try to earn money dog-sitting in Beverly Hills. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Trendship Never Ends: Does keeping up with the trends make you popular? Everyone at Mapleview Middle is buzzing about the latest smartwatch craze that's sweeping the nation! (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Relay Race: The Tikis team up with the Tao Twins for a relay race, but Monk can't stand the change in his brother's behavior. He ends up quitting the team, leaving behind Sun and Lotus. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Catalyst: A Shard causes freak weather but the Beasticons aren't up for the hunt. When they go into a frozen state, Jade is desperate enough to leave them in Xinyan's "care." (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Skeleton Key: After hours, Kai helps L.J. search the school for confiscated dice, using a Skeleton Key (Shard)! It opens any door but leads anywhere the keyholder thinks of. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Troublemaker: A rock star is scheduled to visit the bakery owned by Marinette's parents, but his overwhelmed personal assistant is akumatized by Hawk Moth. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Dearest Family: Galette day this year is eventful for Marinette; Tikki is acting very strange and three supervillains show up! (S4 Ep21)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: What Makes a Hero a Hero?: Yosh the Overcrusher battles one of Goha's most dangerous agents - his own mummy! (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Robo Teacher: When a substitute teacher fills in for Chef, Duncan thinks it's going to be the best day ever. He's wrong. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Glove Glove Me Do: Owen's newly found gloves make him great at everything. But this greatness comes at a high price. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tooth About Zombies: Gwen's favourite event, the Zombie March, falls on the same day as Beth's nightmare event, dental check-up day. The two girls find a way to help each other out. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Lie-ranosaurus Wrecked: Owen pretends to be Izzy's pet dinosaur after leading her to believe she dug him up in the school playground. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: What Makes a Hero a Hero?: Yosh the Overcrusher battles one of Goha's most dangerous agents - his own mummy! (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: A Chance of Victory in Pinch! It is Time For Counterattack Son Goku!: Goku is having trouble facing Golden Frieza until he realises his opponent is quickly losing stamina. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Lie-ranosaurus Wrecked: Owen pretends to be Izzy's pet dinosaur after leading her to believe she dug him up in the school playground. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: An Egg-stremely Bad Idea: Hoping to 'brighten her day,' Izzy and Owen revamp Gwen's egg chair. (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Exercising The Demons: When a severe screen addiction makes the kids lazy, Chef brings in a professional to whip them into shape. (S2 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pudding The Planet First: After Chef says opposing viewpoints make the world more interesting and fun, Izzy applies it in the worst way possible. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Supply Mum: When Chef's mum becomes the supply teacher for a day, Duncan replaces Chef's to-do list with one of his own. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Mooshy Mon Mons: After eating Chef's extremely rare and expensive chocolates, Courtney drags Owen, Izzy and Beth all the way to the Norberian Alps of Fruffenberg to replace them. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Student Becomes The Teacher: Chef is knocked unconscious right before a school board evaluator shows up for a big review. Now Owen has to fill in so Chef doesn't lose his teaching licence. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Beth And The Beanstalk: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Me, My Elf, And I: Duncan tricks Chef into taking the class to the North Pole to remove his name from the naughty list. (S2 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snow Country For Old Men: In an attempt to win the holidays, Chef brings snowmen to life. But when they turn out to be evil, Chef and the kids have to jingle some bells. (S2 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Gold And The Stickerful: Courtney becomes infatuated with a new gold sticker incentive program that Chef introduces to the class. (S2 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bad Seed: Chef introduces the kids to agriculture by teaching them how to grow plants from seeds. But when Izzy shows her seed too much love, it turns into a monster! (S2 Ep44)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Fish Called Leshawna: After eating some mystery fish sticks, Leshawna achieves every little girl's dream and transforms into a mermaid! (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Big Moe's Big Race: Big Moe discovers that Mouse, his daughter, is drone-racing! He's adamant : she.must.come.home. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Great Egg Race: The Sirens, the Tikis and the Tao Twins must find a totem hidden on the Spiderweb Circuit! (S1 Ep12)

programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn y farchnad lle ma na lot o stondinau yn gwerthu lot o nwyddau. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop are in the market where there are lots of stalls selling different things.

programme.title: Sam Tn
programme.desc: Mae pawb wedi ymgasglu yn y parc am yr wyl flynyddol ym Mhontypandy - beth all fynd o'i le? Everyone has gathered in the park for the annual festival in Pontypandy - what could go wrong?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin wedi trefnu dawns-ginio ac yn cael gwersi cha cha cha gan Mama Polenta. Sin learns the cha cha cha, but has to improvise when the town hall roof collapses.

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol Bro Gwydir, Llanrwst yn ymweld ag Asra yr wythnos hon. Children from Ysgol Bro Gwydir, Llanrwst visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Y tro hwn: cn fywiog sy'n helpu plant ymarfer cyfri i dri. A lively song that helps little ones count to three!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae prinder dwr ym Mhen Cyll. Mae Digbi a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio dysgu pam. There's a water-shortage in Pen Cyll. Digbi and his friends go in search of the reason.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan nad oes dwr ar gyfer injans, a all y dreigiau drwsio pethau heb gael eu stemio! When there's no water for engines, can the dragons fix things without getting steamed up!

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto'n credu ei fod wedi llwyddo i ddod llond trol o 'sgewyll adre', ond cath flin Mr Puw sydd yn y drol! Guto brings home Mr Puw's cat rather than a cart of freshly picked sprouts.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Gwenllian sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Gwenllian join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: 'Buwch' yw gair heddiw ac mae Bp Bp, Pi Po, Bop a Bw yn dysgu'r gair tra'n chwarae. 'Buwch' is today's word and Bp Bp, Pi Po, Bop and Bw learn the word whilst playing.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae cystadleuaeth rhwng Deian a Loli mewn gm o golff gwyllt, ac mae chwarae'n troi'n chwerw wrth i'r ddau daro'r bl run pryd i'r felin wynt a'i thorri. A game of crazy golf turns bad!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan fydd siarc rhesog yn llyncu camera sydd gan Ceri y crwban mr, ac yna yn bygwth Ceri ei hun, mae'n rhaid i Ira a'r Octonots ddod i'w hachub. A turtle needs rescuing from a tiger shark.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Cai yn mynd ar antur gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud i weld sut mae rhiwbob yn cael ei dyfu. Cai goes on an adventure with Hywel the magical farmer to see how rhubarb is grown.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Byddwn yn dysgu am awyrennau yn y bennod yma, a phwy wnaeth ddyfeisio ac adeiladu'r awyren gyntaf. We'll learn about Aeroplanes in this episode, and about who invented the first one.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Sali Mali a'i ffrindiau'n achub oen bach sydd wedi mynd yn gaeth o dan eira gyda'i fam. Sali Mali and her friends rescue a little lamb that is trapped in the snow with its mum.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae 'na ras fawr yn digwydd ar y traeth heddiw rhwng Sebra, Fflamingo a Mwnci ac mae pob un yn siwr y byddant yn ennill! It's race day and Zebra, Flamingo and Monkey each want to win!

programme.title: Patrl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod Sioe Dalent Porth yr Haul! Mae'r Maer yn poeni nad oes digon o berfformwyr ond mae'r cwn talentog yn camu i'r adwy. The Pups help out at the local Talent Show.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd morladron Ysgol Gwenllian yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys nl? Can the pirates from Ysgol Gwenllian help Ben Dant and Cadi?

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn enwi pob anifail sy'n byw yn yr anialwch, ond allwch chi enwi'r planhigyn pigog sy'n tyfu mewn lle poeth a sych fel hyn? The Tralalas explore the hot and dry desert.

programme.title: Sam Tn
programme.desc: Ma Ben a Hana yn cystadlu mewn ras ganwio, ac mae'r ddau'n gystadleuol iawn... ond mae angen help Sam cyn hir! Ben and Hana compete in a canoe race, but Sam's help is needed eventually...

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Penny wedi trefnu arddangosfa o luniau. Tybed beth fydd y beirniad yn ei feddwl o hunan bortreadau'r plant? Sin gives the children chopped vegetables to make pizza self-portraits!

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol y Graig, Llangefni yn ymweld ag Asra y tro hwn. Children from Ysgol y Graig, Llangefni visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Mae "Clap Clap un, dau, tri" yn gn hwyliog sy'n cyflwyn ystumiau amrywiol. "Clap Clap un, dau, tri" is a jolly song introducing various gestures.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi yn achosi i'r beic golli pob rheolaeth ac mae'r parseli'n cwympo driphlith draphlith ar hyd y lle. A bike goes out of control sending parcels flying everywhere!

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan na fydd baneri newydd ar gyfer y rheilffordd yn cyrraedd, a all y dreigiau achub y dydd? When new flags for the railway don't arrive, can the dragons to save the day?

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto yn penderfynu gosod Mr Cadno a Tomi Broch benben 'i gilydd. When Guto decides to set Mr Cadno and Tomi Broch against each other, he discovers breaking the food chain is hard!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: 'Aba-dwbi-d', tybed pa Abada gaiff ei ddewis i edrych am air newydd heddiw, 'camfa' ? One of the Abadas sets off in search of a stile in today's programme.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Tra'n yr archfarchnad heddiw nid yw Pablo'n gallu penderfynu pa fath o basta mae eisiau i de. Ond mae'n rhaid iddo ddewis un ohonynt. Pablo can't decide what type of pasta to have for tea.

programme.title: Amser Maith Yn l
programme.desc: Stori o Oes y Tuduriaid sydd gan Tadcu i Ceti heddiw yn 'Amser Maith Maith yn l'. Grandad has a story from Tudor times.

programme.desc: Mae'r Garddwr wedi cymryd lle Twm Twrch a Twm Twrch wedi cymryd lle'r Garddwr - ac am y tro cyntaf mae'r ddau yn dod i ddeall ei gilydd yn well. The Gardener and Twm Twrch swap places today.

programme.title: Playtime
programme.desc: 1967. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. With Barbara Dennek & Rita Maiden. When Monsieur Hulot has to contact a US official in Paris, he gets lost in the complexity of the modern city. [S]

programme.title: The Fourth War
programme.desc: 1990. Drama. Directed by John Frankenheimer. Stars Roy Scheider, Jrgen Prochnow & Tim Reid. On the Russian border, the murder of a defector sparks a forbidden battle between two colonels. [S]

programme.title: The Angry Silence
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Director: Guy Green. Stars: Richard Attenborough, Pier Angeli, Michael Craig & Bernard Lee. Tom Curtis works at a factory but refuses to participate in an unofficial strike. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: Magic Carpet. 1972. A look at the intricate process of making a carpet, including a visit to a carpet-weaving factory to observe the modern day methods.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Vanished Detective. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Sherlock Holmes disappears, urging Dr. Watson and Inspector Lestrade to find him. [S]

programme.title: Night Ride
programme.desc: 1937. Drama. Director: John Paddy Carstairs. Stars Jimmy Hanley, Wally Patch, Julian Vedey & Joan Ponsford. Two drivers, sacked by the trucking company they work for, decide to form their own. [S]

programme.title: Web of Evidence
programme.desc: 1959. Thriller. Director: Jack Cardiff. Stars Van Johnson, Vera Miles, Bernard Lee & Jean Kent. A WW2 evacuee returns years later to England and finds his father in prison and framed for murder. [S]

programme.title: Part-Time Wife
programme.desc: 1961. Comedy. Directed by Max Varnel. Stars Anton Rodgers, Nyree Dawn Porter & Kenneth J. Warren. A husband 'loans' his wife to his bachelor friend who needs to make a good impression. [S]

programme.title: As Long as They're Happy
programme.desc: 1955. Comedy. Directed by J. Lee Thompson. Stars Jack Buchanan, Janette Scott, Jean Carson. In England, an American singer causes havoc when he stays with a stockbroker's family by mistake. [S]

programme.title: Blanche Fury
programme.desc: 1948. Crime. Director: Marc Allegret, Stars Valerie Hobson, Stewart Granger & Michael Gough. Penniless governess Blanche Fullerton takes a job at the estate of her rich relations, the Fury family. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: To Catch a Thief - Part 1. 1973. Stars Sam Kelly, Sheila Gish & Keith Drinkel. A stolen car has been found containing a painting which has also been stolen. The owner of the car is now on trial. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: To Catch a Thief - Part 2. 1973. Stars Sheila Gish, Michael Rose & David Ashford. Erika Brabazon is cross examined by Charles Lotterby and Charlie Binns give details of how the painting was found. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: To Catch a Thief - Part 3. 1973. Stars Keith Drinkel, Madeleine Cannon & Oscar Quitak. Ronald Halsey is cross examined about his finances and an art expert makes a surprising claim. [S]

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Cities
programme.desc: 1958. Drama. Directed by Ralph Thomas. Stars Dirk Bogarde, Dorothy Tutin, Cecil Parker & Stephen Murray. During the French Revolution, Lucie Manette falls in love with a duplicitous Englishman. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories

programme.title: The Cheaters

programme.title: The Brothers

programme.title: In a Lonely Place
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Directed by Nicholas Ray. Stars Humphrey Bogart & Gloria Grahame. When a screenwriter is accused of murder his neighbour comes to his rescue, but she soon starts to have her doubts. [S]

programme.title: Up Pompeii

programme.title: Arizona Dream

programme.title: Arizona Dream
programme.desc: 1993. Drama. Director: Emir Kusturica. Stars Johnny Depp, Faye Dunaway, Vincent Gallo. A young New Yorker goes to Arizona for a wedding and becomes intertwined in the lives of two eccentric women. [S]

programme.title: The Curse of the Wraydons

programme.title: The Riverside Murder

programme.title: Scarlet Thread

programme.title: River Patrol
programme.desc: 1948. Crime Drama. Director: Ben R. Hart. Stars John Blythe, Wally Patch & Stan Paskin. Two police officers go undercover as husband and wife to expose a smuggling ring operating along the Thames. [S]

programme.title: The End of the Line

programme.title: Crooks In Cloisters

programme.title: An Honourable Murder

programme.title: Lydia

programme.title: Invasion
